translations.Please note that the data from alpha2 ca:
Please note that the data from alpha2 can only be migrated manually.
						A detailed documentation to guide you during this process is available using the button below.
translations.üéâ Nextcloud becomes part of the feder: üéâ Nextcloud becomes part of the federated social networks!
translations.** Disclaimer: this is an ALPHA version:
** Disclaimer: this is an ALPHA version **

**üéâ Nextcloud becomes part of the federated social networks!**

**üôã Find your friends:** No matter if they use Nextcloud, üêò Mastodon, üá´ Friendica, and soon ‚ú± Diaspora, üëπ MediaGoblin and more ‚Äì you can follow them!

**üìú Profile info:** No need to fill out more profiles ‚Äì your info from Nextcloud will be used and extended.

**üëê Own your posts:** Everything you post stays on your Nextcloud!

**üï∏ Open standards:** We use the established ActivityPub standard!
translations.Social needs the .well-known automatic d: Social needs the .well-known automatic discovery to be properly set up. If Nextcloud is not installed in the root of the domain, it is often the case that Nextcloud cannot configure this automatically. To use Social, the administrator of this Nextcloud instance needs to manually configure the .well-known redirects:
translations.ActivityPub requires a fixed URL to make: ActivityPub requires a fixed URL to make entries unique. Note that this cannot be changed later without resetting the Social app.
translations.The Social app needs to be set up by the: The Social app needs to be set up by the server administrator.
translations.Do not post to public timelines: Do not post to public timelines
translations.Error while trying to post your message:: Error while trying to post your message: Could not find any valid recipients.
translations.There were no results for your search:: There were no results for your search:
translations.Posts from people you follow will show u: Posts from people you follow will show up here
translations.Posts directed to you will show up here: Posts directed to you will show up here
translations.Posts from other people on this instance: Posts from other people on this instance will show up here
translations.You have not received any notifications: You have not received any notifications yet
translations.Posts from federated instances will show: Posts from federated instances will show up here
translations.No posts found for this tag: No posts found for this tag
translations.{appDisplayName} would like permission t: {appDisplayName} would like permission to access your account. It is a third party application.
translations.If you do not trust it, then you should: If you do not trust it, then you should not authorise it.
translations.Please confirm that you want to follow t: Please confirm that you want to follow this account:
translations.This step is needed as the user is proba: This step is needed as the user is probably not registered on the same server as you are. We will redirect you to your homeserver to follow this account.
translations.Sorry, we could not find the account of: Sorry, we could not find the account of {userId}
translations.Nextcloud becomes part of the federated: Nextcloud becomes part of the federated social networks!
translations.We automatically created a Social accoun: We automatically created a Social account for you. Your Social ID is the same as your Federated Cloud ID:
translations.Since you are new to Social, start by fo: Since you are new to Social, start by following the official Nextcloud account so you don't miss any news
